document_name: Strengthening Ukraine's emerging modernization and innovation results
Prodoc_Strengthening Ukraine's Emerging Modernizationa dn Innovation Results project.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/UKR/Prodoc_Strengthening Ukraine's Emerging Modernizationa dn Innovation Results project.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
The Programme aims at equipping UNDP to meet the Ukrainian Government and civil society's demand, at both national and sub-national levels, for rapid, quality and relevant expertise to strengthen the country's emerging modernization and innovation results. Specifically, during its 3 years' implementation period, the programme will work towards sustaining key results contributing to the modernization process of the country, including the emergence of:
• A modern and performing economy applying principles of sustainability 
• Innovative partnerships and funding mechanisms for development
• Modern social services delivery mechanisms and systems
• Public consultation  mechanism for effective and equitable development decisions , and
• Environmental innovations.
De-escalation and stabilization in Ukraine supported

project_descr: The programme was developed to meet the Ukrainian Government and civil society demand at the national and sub-national levels for relevant expertize to strengthen Ukraine's emerging modernization and innovation results
